alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 24 at 12:03AM PST until February 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures between 20 and 28 are expected. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Valley and Cuyama Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
